sen.j: 宗形 氏祀（むなかた の うしし）は、宗像（現在の福岡県宗像市）の豪族。
sen.e: MUNAKATA no Ushishi was a local ruling family in Munakata (present Munakata City, Fukuoka Prefecture).
MUNAKATA no Ushishi was a local ruling family in Munakata (present Munakata City, Fukuoka Prefecture).
MUNAKATA no Ushishi was a local ruling family in Munakata (present Munakata City, Fukuoka Prefecture).

sen.j: 「宗形」は、「宗像」とも、「胸形」とも、「胸方」とも、「胸肩」とも表記する。
sen.e: Munakata (宗形) can also be written as "宗像", "胸形", "胸方", or "胸肩" in Chinese character.
Munakata (宗形) can also be written as "宗像", "胸形", "胸方", or "胸肩" in Chinese characters.
Munakata (宗形) can also be written as '宗像,' '胸形,' '胸方,' or '胸肩' in Chinese characters.

sen.j: 宗形徳善の孫あるいは曾孫とされる。
sen.e: He is believed to be a grandchild or great-grandchild of MUNAKATA no Tokuzen.
He is believed to be a grandchild or great-grandchild of MUNAKATA no Tokuzen.
He is believed to be a grandchild or great-grandchild of MUNAKATA no Tokuzen.

sen.j: 子に秋世、と伝えられる。
sen.e: It is said that his son was Akiyo.
It is said that his son was Akiyo.
It is said that his son was Akiyo.

sen.j: 宗像大領と伝えられる。
sen.e: It is said that he was Dairyo (Chief district official) of Munakata.
It is said that he was Dairyo (Chief district official) of Munakata.
It is said that he was Dairyo (Chief district official) of Munakata.

sen.j: ただし他の史料は残っていない。
sen.e: Other historical materials has not remained, however.
Other historical materials has not remained, however.
Other historical materials has not remained, however.
